titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, [4. 2. 1930 ?]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (deutsch: Briefe, S. 167; Cambridge Letters, S. 240).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I wanted to come & see you to day, partly to ask your advise in a few things concerning College etc. But I have got a bad cold & think I ought to stay at home. Could you come & have tea with me tomorrow (Wednesday) or if that isn't possible the day after? I hope you aren't ill too. If you can come either day don't bother to reply.
